plain_text:
For the first time since Dez Bryant was released last Friday, Cowboy head coach Jason Garrett and
team captions spoke publicly about the move.
A lot of different factors into these kinds of decisions. The guidepost for all of this is what's in the
best interest of the Dallas Cowboys football team. That's why we made this decision.
We wish Dez nothing but the best forward.  He loves football and is a great player.
